fullText: Bruce Willis brings his action-hero persona to Stephen King's psycho-thriller, but Laurie Metcalf is the real draw in this effectively creepy Broadway adaptation.
dtliExcerpt: Bruce Willis brings his action-hero persona to Stephen King's psycho-thriller, but Laurie Metcalf is the real draw in this effectively creepy Broadway adaptation.
